item.title: Creating this GitHub Pages Blog
item.description:
Journey of creating this Blog (with AI)

Iâ€™ve been wanting to start a blog for a while now. Somthing that integrates my love for tech with everything else in my life. I wanted to build it from scratch, make it my own. Cos UI isn’t my strongest skill, I kept putting it off for another day, a day when I’ll be awesome at HTML, CSS, JS and everything else in between.
